sentences.en: A sudden smile of recognition flashed across his face.
sentences.cn: 他脸上掠过一丝笑意,表示认识对方.

sentences.en: An expression of dumb recognition wiggled across her features.
sentences.cn: 她不语，从她脸上掠过的一丝表情可知她是认得的。

sentences.en: But by the year 2020 business computing will have changed beyond recognition.
sentences.cn: 但是到了2020年，商业计算会变得面目全非。

sentences.en: Don’s recognition of the importance of Suzy in his life
sentences.cn: 唐认识到苏济在他生命中的重要性

sentences.en: He glanced briefly towards her but there was no sign of recognition.
sentences.cn: 他瞥了她一眼，但似乎没认出她来。

sentences.en: He has achieved recognition and respect as a scientist.
sentences.cn: 作为科学家，他得到人们的赞赏和尊敬。

sentences.en: He stared at her, but there was no sign of recognition .
sentences.cn: 他盯着她看，但似乎没认出她来。

sentences.en: He stared at her, but there was no sign of recognition.
sentences.cn: 他盯着她看，但似乎没认出她来。

sentences.en: Her brother gave a cry of recognition.
sentences.cn: 她哥哥认了出来，惊呼了一声。

sentences.en: His body was crushed and mangled beyond recognition.
sentences.cn: 他的身体被压得血肉模糊，根本无法辨认。

sentences.en: His recitals have earned him recognition as a talented performer.
sentences.cn: 他的演奏会使他赢得了天才演奏家的赞誉.

sentences.en: She passed close by me without a sign of recognition.
sentences.cn: 她与我擦肩而过,却没认出我.

sentences.en: The bodies were mutilated beyond recognition.
sentences.cn: 尸体都残缺不全，无法辨认了。

sentences.en: The city has been built up really fast; It's changed beyond recognition.
sentences.cn: 这城市建设得真快, 于今已看不出它原来的面貌了.

sentences.en: The facilities have improved beyond all recognition.
sentences.cn: 这些设备经过大幅度的改良，都让人认不出来了。

sentences.en: The place has changed beyond recognition.
sentences.cn: 这地方变得认不出来了.

sentences.en: The situation in Eastern Europe has changed out of all recognition.
sentences.cn: 东欧的形势经历了巨变。

sentences.en: Their recognition of the new law is unlikely.
sentences.cn: 这项新法律不大可能获得他们的承认.

sentences.en: There is a general recognition of the urgent need for reform.
sentences.cn: 人们普遍认识到迫切需要改革。

sentences.en: This lack of recognition was at the root of the dispute.
sentences.cn: 这种不被承认就是这次纷争的根源。

words.tran_cn: 可辨认的；可认识的；可承认的
承认；认出；辨别（recognise的过去分词）
认识；意识到（recogniz的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 公众认识阶段；公共认可，公众接受度

trans.tran_en: the act of realizing and accepting that something is true or important
